title: Happy Birthday, Mia!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Augh!? Y-You scared me! Why are you here, Yoshiko? This is Nijigaku’s dorm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane. I can go anywhere by navigating the dark abysses. I’ve descended here today to complete a mission......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hmmm. Well, I’m gonna go now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hold on! Hold on! Wait a minute! Aren’t you interested in my mission!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not particularly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Come on! Mia, I’m here to kidnap you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m going to drag you away now. The divine laws compel you to attend this banquet......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ah, I see. It’s a birthday party for me. You all went out of your way to get together. Thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t break it down like that! I’ll look like an idiot~! Happy birthday. Mia! Let’s get to the club room!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
